definition: (idiom) dead end/road to ruin
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
surname Lu
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Capitalism is a dead end;there is no future for it.
sentences.chinese: 资本主义是死路一条，那里根本没有未来可言。

sentences.english: Companies that do not belong to a community of discourse will die.
sentences.chinese: 企业若不能参与到尚存论说的群体中，只有死路一条。

sentences.english: Because of the economic times in buyer's market, not sale has blind lane only.
sentences.chinese: 因为在买方市场的经济时代，不营销只有死路一条。

sentences.english: You're hungry, thirsty and eventually you'll die.
sentences.chinese: 你又饥又渴，最终死路一条。

sentences.english: I'll seek you out, flay you alive. One more word and you won't survive.
sentences.chinese: 我要找到你，生吞活剥，总而言之死路一条。

sentences.english: Rule number one: Trial is war, second place is death.
sentences.chinese: 法庭即战场，输家死路一条。

sentences.english: North and south home and said blue revolting, rice said that is a dead end.
sentences.chinese: 南北回家和米蓝说闹革命，米蓝说那是死路一条。

sentences.english: Why do men have to enter the tomb to the end then?
sentences.chinese: 有人说婚姻是坟墓，踏进去只有死路一条。

sentences.english: It is fatal to enter any war without the will to win it.
sentences.chinese: 没有求胜的欲望，进行任何战争都只能是死路一条。

definition: to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
dead end/(fig.) the road to disaster
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
to have no other choice
to sit and wait for death (idiom); resigned to one's fate
life/to survive/to save a life/to scrape a living
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
hands tied and waiting to be captured
everything bodes ill, no positive signs (idiom); inauspicious/everything points to disaster
through road/way out/way to survive/means of subsistence
labor/physical work
(coll.) to be done for
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: lit. to strike a stone with egg (idiom); to attempt the impossible/to invite disaster by overreaching oneself
there is no alternative
to court death/taking risks
as matters stand/things having reached this stage
